price: 本当にそれらは、私にとっての敵。全創造物の主*だけが違うのです。
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
